src:
三大法人買超台股99.12億元
01 Nov 2019, 15:41 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, 中央通訊社
台股1日漲40.82點，收在11399.53點，成交值新台幣1332.48億元。三大法人合計買超新台幣99.12億元，自營商買超14.23億元，投信賣超2.98億元，外資及陸資買超87.87億元。中央社製圖 108年11月1日
text:
The three legal persons bought super-unit stocks of 9.912 billion yuan
01 Nov 2019, 15:41 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, Central News Agency
Taiwan stocks rose 40.82 points on the 1st, closing at 11399.53 points, and the transaction value was NT$133.248 billion. The three major legal persons bought a total of 99.12 billion yuan in super-new Taiwan dollars, self-employed to buy over 1.423 billion yuan, and the investment in sales exceeded 298 million yuan. Foreign capital and land-based purchases exceeded 8.787 billion yuan. Central Society Charting November 1, 108
